project.name: Gentoo Status
project.description: The Gentoo Status Subprojects primary goal is to keep end users up to date on the status of the Gentoo Project and all it's subprojects.

longdescription.p: The Gentoo Status Subprojects primary goal is to keep end users up to date on the status of the Gentoo Project and all it's subprojects.

Presently this will entail a yearly "State of Gentoo" article featured in the GWN. To facilitate this all Projects should be encouraged to update their /proj/ page and submit a short 1-3 paragraph (or longer) status report.
